head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VAN WORMER, BENJAMIN F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VAN WORMER, BENJAMIN F.

block.p: VAN WORMER-Benjamin F., of West Norwalk, Connecticut on Thursday, May 4th, a retired Senior Vice President of American Standard, Inc. Husband of Marjorie. Father of Frances and Laura Van Wormer and Susan and Robert Ault. A Memorial Service will be held Wednesday, May 10th at 11:00 AM at St. Luke's Episcopal Church, 1848 Boston Post Rd., Darien, Connecticut. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations may be sent to The Benjamin F. Van Wormer Memorial Fund, St. Lawrence University, Canton, NY 13617.
